answers.answer: There is a lot of information out there, google Metatarsalgia.... also Diabetes is a factor in some cases, good luck seems a lot of folks have it...

Well, I can almost for certain rule out you have Sciatica.  That pain is distinctive; it would be extending up the leg into the buttocks region.  I would recommend making an appointment with a Podiatrist; specialty for feet.  He or she can examine you and make the proper recommendations.  I would also make a diary about the pain; what time of day you are having it, what shoes you were wearing, if you were barefooted, etc.Good luck.

question: I have put the question under arthritis but really don't know how to classify this problem. My feet are excruciatingly painful on the soles - and don't know where to start . I was initially linking it to sciatica but now doubt that.Help!This discussion is related to/posts/show/227668.
title: burning feet soles
